stems.BSC: (to be) an act of thinking/cogitating; to think/cogitate
stems.CSV: (to be) the thought one is thinking
stems.OBJ: (to be) the basis/trigger for a thought; that which makes one think of something

stems: (to be) something one is considering/mulling/contemplating; to consider, mull, contemplate, take into account
(to be) an act of reasoning; to reason, use one's intellect [= employ a strict process of integrating logic and experience when thinking/analyzing]
notes:
Derivations: ponder, deliberate/deliberation, contemplate, mull, concentrate, theory, hypothesis, judge, conclude/conclusion.

This root is also used as the **PROPOSITIVE (PPV) Bias Affix**: *"what if..." "It could be that...." "Consider this: ..." "Posit the following: ..." "Assume for the sake of argument that...."*

stems: (to be) ana ct of thinking up/of an idea; to brainstorm; to come up with an idea (CSV = an idea)
(to be) an act of analysis; to analyze
(to be) an act of abstraction; to abstract (CPT = conceptualization/conceptualize, CSV = a concept)

refers: MODE OF THINKING / MODE OF ANALYSIS

stems.BSC: (to be) a state/act/process of convergent/critical thinking/analysis using logic; to think/analyze logically [i.e., using the rules of logic]
stems.CTE: (to be) the state/process of convergent/critical thinking/analysis using logic
stems.CSV: (to be) thought/conclusion one is thinking/contemplating as part of or as a result of convergent/critical thinking/analysis using logic
stems.OBJ: (to be) a rule of logic by which one conducts convergent/critical thinking/analysis

stems: (to be) a state/act/process of divergent/creative thinking relying on imagination, inspiration, and creative instinct
(to be) a state/act/process of lateral thinking "outside the box" employing a synthesis of divergent thinking and convergent thinking

stems.BSC: (to be) a state/act/process of deductive thinking; to engage in deductive thinking (based on an analysis of external evidence) [CPT = a deduction; to deduce (something)]
stems.CTE: (to be) the state/process of deductive reasoning/analysis
stems.CSV: (to be) the thought/conclusion one is thinking via deductive reasoning
stems.OBJ: (to be) a rule of logic by which one conducts deductive thinking/analysis

stems: (to be) a state/act/process of inference; to infer (something implied by external evidence)
(to be) a state/act/process a deductive insight; to experience a feeling of insight/understanding about something via deductive reasoning

stems.BSC: (to be) an act of suggesting something, i.e., proferring an idea as to potential course of action or way of thinking
stems.CTE: (to be) a state of having a suggestion made to one; listening to/hearing/reading a suggestion being made
stems.CSV: (to be) the words/means/method of making a suggestion
stems.OBJ: (to be) a suggestion, the idea offered as a potential course of action or way of thinking

stems: (to be) a piece of advice; to advise
notes: This root is also used as the **SUGGESTIVE (SGS) Bias Affix**: *"How about..." "We could..." "Might I suggest..."*

stems: (to be) an instance of counseling; to counsel
(to be) an act of advocating; to advocate
